name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouLoop - Replay your favorite video parts

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to loop specific parts of your YouTube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily loop specific parts of your favorite online videos with YouLoop. 

Introducing YouLoop, a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your video watching experience. Whether you're learning a new skill, enjoying music videos, or analyzing specific scenes, YouLoop allows you to loop precise segments of any online video effortlessly.

Key Features:

âž¤ Custom Loop Points: Set start and end points for looping any part of a video.
âž¤ Easy to Use: Intuitive interface seamlessly integrates with your video watching experience.
âž¤ Perfect for Learning: Ideal for practicing musical instruments, language learning, or going over educational content repeatedly.
âž¤ Entertainment and Analysis: Enjoy your favorite video parts on loop or analyze specific scenes in-depth.

With YouLoop, you have the ultimate control over how you watch online videos. Get ready to loop, learn, and enjoy!
